renderer

Class R_OrthoCamera

  • java.lang.Object
    • renderer.R_AbstractCamera
      • renderer.R_OrthoCamera

  • public class R_OrthoCamera
extends R_AbstractCamera
    This class provides a camera for rendering a scene in an orthographic(2D) view
    Author:
    Stephen Thompson ID: 300332215

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • R_OrthoCamera

        public R_OrthoCamera(java.lang.String name,
                     Vec3 position,
                     Vec3 target,
                     Vec3 up,
                     float near,
                     float far,
                     float scale)
        Constructor for creating a new orthographic camera
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the camera
        position - The position of the camera
        target - The position where the camera is pointing
        up - The up vector, use Vec3.UnitY if unsure of what to use
        near - The closest distance object can be to the camera to get drawn
        far - The farthest distance object can be to the camera to get drawn
        scale - The zoom factor
        aspect - The aspect ratio (renderer's width/render's height)

    • Method Detail

      • setScale

        public void setScale(float scale)
        Parameters:
        scale - - sets the camera's scale

      • getScale

        public float getScale()
        Returns:
        the camera's scale
